column5: I will be fishing LOTW near kenora and staying at a private cottage on an island about 10 miles out of Kenora. I am looking for any advice someone might have about where to put the boat in and leave the truck and trailer for a week that has secure parking. Thanks! Fred
what area are you staying in? lake of the woods has lots of places to launch and park. i can tell you the closest if i know what area you are staying in?
AGGIE We will be staying just west of Moore Bay Thanks! Fred
Northern Harbour Marina 361 Northern Harbour Rd, Jaffray Melick, ON P9N 3X8 807-548-5719
The last post was my best place. I agree that northern harbour marina is the best choice. It's a pretty straight shot down to Moore bay from there.
Does any one have any more suggestions? Thanks! Fred
You are welcome to leave your truck and trailer at my place as I am close to there but I don't have a launch. Also you could try Smith Camps.

Deadhead1 Would you know if Smith Camps would let someone launch for a fee of course without staying there? What have you heard about Bare Point Marina, I noticed that a couple resorts in the area use them for there customers launching and parking. Thanks for the offer to park at your place. Thanks Again! Fred
